name: 乔治·卡林：你们都有病 George Carlin: You Are All Diseased
introduction: Legendary comic Carlin comes back to the Beacon theater to angrily rant about airport security, germs, cigars, angels, children and parents, men, names, religion, god, advertising, Bill Jeff and minorities.
comments: 尺度可是不小啊，哈哈哈哈
哈哈，喷布鲁斯那段太有爱了，我喜欢这个old honky-hating racist
